Due to scheduled infrastructure upgrades, all our services and features will be temporarily unavailable on Wednesday, November 24, beginning at 9 AM UTC.

Due to scheduled infrastructure upgrades, all our services and features will be temporarily unavailable on Wednesday, November 24, beginning at 9 AM UTC. The upgrading process will last approximately one hour.

After this period, most services should be back online, but some features may take slightly longer to get back to full speed due to the nature of the upgrade. We will make sure to keep you updated on our Twitter channel.

Depending on market conditions at the time, we may delay the maintenance to a future date to ensure the smallest possible impact on our customers’ trading activity.
